      • isInCuts

        public boolean isInCuts(org.clas12.analysisTools.event.particles.Particle particleToTest)
        Analyze if a particle is in the cut requirements
        Parameters:
        particleToTest - particle to analyze
        Returns:
        false if particle is supposed to be cut, true if particle is in the requirements
